title: Get all RACING SERIES-has-racing-event Relationships
description:
* A list of all ›has-racing-event‹ relationships for the selected RACING SERIES is returned when there exists at least one of them. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Each item in the list contains the relationship ID and the two node IDs, but not the nodes itself.
* An empty list is returned when no ›has-racing-event‹ relationship exists. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Requests with invalid ID are rejected. This can happen when there exists no node with the given ID or it is not a RACING SERIES. -> Status Code \`404\`
